text: 10:8 2 Korin 12:6; 13:10Ekiam ingangarir kam damuasa gavgavim e ganɨngi. Egha, e ian nɨghnɨzir gavgaviba fasa, a ifonge. Egha e ian nɨghnɨzir gavgavibagh asɨghasɨghan a bar aghua. Kamagh amizɨ, kɨ ingangarir e amir kam bagh bar akuegh, e uan ziaba tong ada fegh, akar mɨkemezir kamɨn aghumsɨghan kogham.
